summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Eastern Avenue, from North Fiftieth Street to Pacific Place; and Pacific Place, from Eastern Avenue to a connection with the present sewer on Pacific Place and North Thirty-seventh Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all wyes, openings, manholes, catch basins, flush tanks and other appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district, in accordance with Resolution No. 2175 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
